annotations.summary: Patient presents with spreading itchy rash on arms and torso for one week.
Rash started on forearms, spread to chest and stomach. Red raised bumps.
Started amoxicillin 10 days ago for urinary tract infection.
No anaphylaxis signs: no breathing difficulty or facial swelling.
Severe nocturnal itching causing excoriations from scratching.
Using hydrocortisone cream with minimal effect and Benadryl for sleep.
Low-grade fever of 99 degrees and joint achiness.
Known ragweed allergy, no known drug allergies.
